CONDOMINIUMS

townhomes
3-bedroom

condominiums
penthouses
3-bedroom
4-bedroom
Spectacular ocean views and the convenience of condominium living will be offered in Phase Two of Seabridge. These units will be as spacious and elegant as the townhomes offered in Phase One, with the added advantage of a more elevated and expansive view of the ocean. Lush landscaping, tropical pools, outdoor entertainment facilities and a first-class fitness center will complement the existing amenities at Seabridge. Construction beginning 2009.
